title: I Cannot Come

tokens.lyric: I cannot come,

lines.raw: [F]I cannot come,

tokens.lyric: I cannot come to the banquet;

lines.raw: [Bb]I cannot come to the banquet;

tokens.lyric: Don't trouble me now.

lines.raw: [F]Don't trouble me now.

tokens.lyric: I have married a wife; I have bought me a cow.

lines.raw: [C7]I have married a wife; I have bought me a cow.

tokens.lyric: I have fields and commitments that cost a pretty sum.

lines.raw: [F7]I have fields and commitments that cost a pretty sum.

tokens.lyric: Pray, hold me excused, I cannot come.

lines.raw: [Bb]Pray, hold me excused, I cannot come.

tokens.lyric: A certain man held a banquet on his estate in town.

lines.raw: [F]A certain man held a banquet on his estate in town.

tokens.lyric: He laid a festive table and wore a wedding gown.

lines.raw: [Bb]He laid a festive table and wore a wedding gown.

tokens.lyric: He sent invitations to his neighbors far and wide

lines.raw: [F]He sent invitations to his neighbors far and wide

tokens.lyric: But when the meal was ready, each of them replied:

lines.raw: [C7]But when the meal was ready, each of them replied:

tokens.lyric: The master rose up in anger, called his servants by name,

lines.raw: [F]The master rose up in anger, called his servants by name,

tokens.lyric: said: "Go into the town, fetch the blind and the lame,

lines.raw: [Dm]said: "Go into the town, fetch the blind and the lame,

tokens.lyric: fetch the peasant and the pauper, for this I have willed,

lines.raw: [F]fetch the peasant and the pauper, for this I have willed,

tokens.lyric: my banquet must be crowded, and my tables must be filled.

lines.raw: [C7]my banquet must be crowded, and my tables must be filled.

tokens.lyric: When all the poor had assembled, there was still room to spare,

lines.raw: [F]When all the poor had assembled, there was still room to spare,

tokens.lyric: so the master demanded: "Go and search everywhere,

lines.raw: [Bb]so the master demanded: "Go and search everywhere,

tokens.lyric: to the highways and the byways and force them to come in.

lines.raw: [F]to the highways and the byways and force them to come in.

tokens.lyric: My table must be filled before the banquet can begin.

lines.raw: [C7]My table must be filled before the banquet can begin.

tokens.lyric: Now God has written a message for the rest of the mankind;

lines.raw: [F]Now God has written a message for the rest of the mankind;

tokens.lyric: If we're slow in responding, He may leave us behind.

lines.raw: [Dm]If we're slow in responding, He may leave us behind.

tokens.lyric: He's preparing a banquet for that great and glorious day

lines.raw: [F]He's preparing a banquet for that great and glorious day

tokens.lyric: When the Lord and Master calls us, be certain not to say:

lines.raw: [C7]When the Lord and Master calls us, be certain not to say:
